about_the_game:
Music From Earlier INDEV versions of Corkscrew:

The majority is composed by the wonderful AKIHORA who is currently working on his own set of games, of which I wish him well, the Archive OST will be one of the final parts of my migration from Gamejolt (and other similar platforms) to Steam and other more professional platforms.

This is my coming of age as a game creator, and I look forward to you seeing it come to fruition!
detailed_description:
Music From Earlier INDEV versions of Corkscrew:

The majority is composed by the wonderful AKIHORA who is currently working on his own set of games, of which I wish him well, the Archive OST will be one of the final parts of my migration from Gamejolt (and other similar platforms) to Steam and other more professional platforms.

This is my coming of age as a game creator, and I look forward to you seeing it come to fruition!
